job_tasks.phrase: werk je aan de dataflows die gaan over het leesgedrag van onder andere artikelen en video's
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes working with data flows, a core component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: het op een slimme manier organiseren van redactiedata
job_tasks.justification: Organizing data in a smart way is a fundamental aspect of data engineering and preparing data for analysis.

job_tasks.phrase: denk je na over de beste manier om de data te organiseren en vereenvoudigen om aan alle behoeften te voldoen
job_tasks.justification: This describes the design and simplification of data structures, which is part of data engineering.
Maintaining a data stack is a key responsibility within MLOps/Operations Engineering for data pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: zie je toe op de code en de bewerking ervan binnen het team
job_tasks.justification: Overseeing code and its processing implies ensuring code quality and workflow within the development process.

job_tasks.phrase: heb je naast je specialistische werk als engineer ook oog voor de behoeften van redacties en andere relevante stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This shows an understanding of stakeholder needs and aligning technical work with business requirements.

job_tasks.phrase: denk je graag mee over verbeteringen en innovaties
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to improvements and innovations requires understanding the business context and goals.

job_tasks.phrase: helpt redacties met inzichten in data om hun doelen te bereiken
job_tasks.justification: While not directly building models, the role supports data scientists who build models to achieve goals, indicating an indirect involvement in the modeling lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: om data products te maken voor redactionele inzichten
job_tasks.justification: Creating data products for insights often involves preparing data for or supporting modeling efforts.

job_tasks.phrase: data scientists hun modellen te delen
job_tasks.justification: Enabling data scientists to share their models implies supporting the modeling process and infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: brugfunctie tussen de Data Area en het Data- & Innovatieteam voor alle technische zaken
job_tasks.justification: Acting as a bridge for technical matters implies involvement in integrating and managing technical aspects of projects, akin to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring van de kwaliteit van data
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring data quality is a crucial aspect of operations and MLOps to ensure reliable data for models and applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Beveiliging van data (access control, data minimalisatie)
job_tasks.justification: Managing data security and access control are operational tasks crucial for production systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Vindbaarheid van data via de Data Mesh
job_tasks.justification: Ensuring data discoverability is a key aspect of data engineering in a Data Mesh architecture.
Ensuring data interoperability is a data engineering task, especially within a Data Mesh context.

soft_skills.phrase: denk je na over de beste manier om de data te organiseren en vereenvoudigen om aan alle behoeften te voldoen
brugfunctie tussen de Data Area en het Data- & Innovatieteam voor alle technische zaken
oog voor de behoeften van redacties en andere relevante stakeholders
denk je graag mee over verbeteringen en innovaties
In de toekomst ontwikkel je je verder in een rol waarin bijvoorbeeld Product Ownership, Technical Ownership of Generative AI belangrijk wordt.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes data engineering, data flows, and data organization with tools like dbt and Airflow. While it mentions supporting data scientists and future development in Generative AI, the core responsibilities and current focus are on data infrastructure and engineering, not direct GenAI model development or application building.
